title.textElement: Olana State Historic Site, Hudson, New York, United States
Frederick Church House
Olana, Frederick Church House
F.E. Church Residence

work.notes: General: Historic site designed by landscape painter Frederick Church that consists of his house and 250 acres of grounds. House was built 1870-1872 with Calvert Vaux as architect, and renovated 1885-1891.

location.place: Hudson, Columbia, New York, United States
